title: Crafting
content: al Product Ingredients Effect Description How to Unlock Antidote Salts of Mugwort Any Suspension Neutralises the effects of all poisons. This concoction appears rather chewable, thick as it is with herbs and roots. Extract Mugwort Duergar Antidote -- Consume the potion to nullify the effects of certain Duergar poisons, grant Advantage on Saving Throws against being Poisoned, and grant Resistance to Poison damage. Concocted of rare ingredients that hasten the drinker's demise unless mixed correct
